body:
Comment 4 by **tarmigan**: 
Yes, to talk to serial ports, I had to use overlapped IO.  I think I sent an email to
golang-dev about it, but I got no response.  I would LOVE for someone who is familiar
with windows to look at it.

I would like to publish it as a package once I have tested it and cleaned it up a bit
more.  Would there be any chance that this could be accepted as an os/serial package?

Thanks,
Tarmigan
Attachments: 1. serial_windows.go (6310 bytes)
